title: The Kids Are All Right
description: Adults often find it really hard to talk about race. But kids? Maybe not so much. NPR received more than 2,000 entries in this year's Student Podcast Challenge, and we heard from young people all over the country about how they're thinking about race and identity in these trying times.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Here are Code Switch's favorite stories from the NPR's 2020 Student Podcast Challenge.
itunes:subtitle: Here are Code Switch's favorite stories from the NPR's 2020 Student Podcast Challenge.
content:encoded: Adults often find it really hard to talk about race. But kids? Maybe not so much. NPR received more than 2,000 entries in this year's Student Podcast Challenge, and we heard from young people all over the country about how they're thinking about race and identity in these trying times.
